nodes.title: Fix issue with empty checkout email
add Shopify standard coding preferences to repo

Introduce unified type of errors by BuyClientError
Add a rational timeout to the endpoints that wrap polling
add countdown latches to the async tests to reliably complete them
fix bad calls in the endpoint
make sure to add the country and province when creating the address for testing
Change the visibility of  the general id field
Add retry logic for network requests

[WIP] Unify unwraping retrofit responses via Rx Transformers.
Refactor BuyClient construction using build pattern #72
update mocked responses with missing test responses
Switched to new Android Test unit runner.
Expose new API endpoints with RxJava Support
Restart ADB server, don't create SD card
add better test for reservation time
update sample to fetch all products
add the application name to the header

use NO_WRAP instead of DEFAULT when processing the authentication header
expose note on the Checkout model
expose Product Title on the Product Variant

don't use shipping address if the checkout does not require shipping

check to see if we have Play Services available before trying to create Play Services Client

bring the default variant check into line with the server

fix explicit include of our test assets in the aar
Introduce separate page setting for collection and product APIs
properties must be a map<String, Object> the value is not always a String
remove properties that are not returned from server, and setters on readonly properties
allow null PaymentToken when completing a checkout

return an error instead of throwing exception if customer token is not set
make usage of Boolean consistent in the APIs

add some extra information about the checkout to Wallet request
use the CustomerId as a parameter for the renew customer api
stop shipping the sample application with the release

login already returns customer now, so we don't need to explicitly call it
Disable test coverage by default and run it only if such prop is set
update customer api to get customer on login
downgrade play services, we don't need the latest right now
remove Android Pay meta data from library manifest and point to production server instead of sandbox
